article.title: Argon ST to Upgrade Surface Ship Torpedo Defense Program
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: Argon ST Incorporated has received a $6.2 million modification for engineering development in support of the U.S. Navy's Surface Ship Torpedo Defense (SSTD) program. The SSTD program is a defensive system development to counter specific undersea weapon threats to high-value surface ships.
